entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023
